price: 31. « Mais pourquoi, s’étonnèrent-ils, ce Coran n’est-il pas descendu (en révélation) sur un notable de l’une des deux cités ? »[478]
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَوۡلَا نُزِّلَ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡقَرۡيَتَيۡنِ عَظِيمٍ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lawlā nuzzila hādhā al-qur'ānu ʿalā rajulin mina al-qaryatayni ʿaẓīmin
